# isInputMuted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app’s audio input is in a muted state.

## Declaration

```swift
var isInputMuted: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Set a new value for this property by calling the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioApplication/setInputMuted(_:)] method.

## Managing audio input mute state

- **setInputMuted(_:)**: Sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the app’s audio input is in a muted state.
- **inputMuteStateChangeNotification**: A notification the system posts when the app’s audio input mute state changes.
- **setInputMuteStateChangeHandler(_:)**: Sets a callback to handle changes to application-level audio muting states.
